title: Nina-san no Mahou Seikatsu
original_name: ニーナさんの魔法生活
sinopse:
Three days dragon flight from the nearest town, deep, deep in the forest, then deeper still, lives a 'witch.' Nina the witch, also called "The world's strongest witch." Visiting her is the apprentice, Iris.

This is the record of the witch and her apprentice's peaceful days, in a remote forest that breathes illusions and magic.

(Source: Batoto)
